name: Deathsworn Elf
description: The Deathsworn Elf is a Medium humanoid characterized by exceptional dexterity and stealth, armed with a scimitar and longbow. Its green fire-imbued arrows mark its deadly ranged skills.
memorable: The Deathsworn Elf’s ability to deal additional fire damage and excel in ambush tactics makes it a unique and formidable foe.
goals: To ambush and eliminate threats from a distance while evading capture.
relations: Often encountered alongside other rogue or fey creatures.
environment: Typically found in wooded or dense environments where it can hide and attack from stealth.
strengths: High mobility, excels in ranged combat, and possesses abilities that enhance stealth and sneak attacks.
weaknesses: Reliance on ranged attacks makes it vulnerable in close combat situations.
attacks: Multiattack allows for rapid ranged attacks; uses both a scimitar in melee and a longbow for piercing damage from afar.
most_powerful_ability: The Volley ability unleashes a devastating cone of fiery arrows, combining piercing and fire damage.
equipment: Armed with a scimitar and a longbow.
senses: Keen hearing and sight grants advantage on Perception checks.
skills: Skilled in stealth, with a proficiency bonus providing a total of +10 in stealth checks.
additional_information: Can use Disengage as a bonus action to escape after attacking.
Imbues arrows with magical fire for additional damage.
Advantage on saving throws against being charmed.
Extra damage when surprising enemies during the first combat round.
test_queries: elf archer that ambushes from stealth
mobile elf skilled in ranged combat
cunning elf with magical arrow abilities
medium humanoid that excels in sneaking
